document.write('<div id=\"gist-318975\" class=\"gist\">\n  \n  \n    \n            \n            \n\n      <div class=\"gist-file\">\n        <div class=\"gist-data gist-syntax\">\n          \n          \n          \n            <div class=\"gist-highlight\"><pre><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC1\">##<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC2\"># To bridge network traffic, like this:<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC3\">#<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC4\"># dom0: fake eth0 -&gt; vif0.0 -+<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC5\">#                            |<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC6\">#                          bridge -&gt; real eth0 -&gt; the network<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC7\">#                            |<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC8\"># domU: fake eth0 -&gt; vifN.0 -+<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC9\">#<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC10\"># use<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC11\">#<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC12\">(network-script network-bridge)<\/div><\/pre><\/div>\n          \n        <\/div>\n\n        <div class=\"gist-meta\">\n          <a href=\"http://gist.github.com/raw/318975/6525a2660d10cf51fb93fc5b91c1a5920c5aa4b3/gistfile2.txt\" style=\"float:right;\">view raw<\/a>\n          <a href=\"http://gist.github.com/318975#file_gistfile2.txt\" style=\"float:right;margin-right:10px;color:#666\">gistfile2.txt<\/a>\n          <a href=\"http://gist.github.com/318975\">This Gist<\/a> brought to you by <a href=\"http://github.com\">GitHub<\/a>.\n        <\/div>\n      <\/div>\n    \n            \n            \n  \n<\/div>\n')
